place.name: THORNTON LE MOOR
place.gazetteerText: THORNTON-LE-MOOR, a parish in Caistor district, Lincoln; 3 miles SW of Moortown r. station, and 6 SW of Caistor. Post town, Caistor. Acres, 1,503. Real property, £1,732. Pop., 127. Houses, 22. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £319.* Patron, the Bishop of L. The church is Norman. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
